message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for sale. Given its high quality and value, I believe it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. Considering its worth to you and the market value, I propose a price of $100 for the product. This allows us both to benefit from the transaction. Please let me know if this offer suits you, and we can proceed with the purchase.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. However, based on my budget constraints, I am only willing to pay up to $90 for it. I hope this revised offer is acceptable to you.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet somewhere in the middle. To further accommodate your budget while still ensuring fair compensation for the product, I would like to counteroffer at $95. I believe this price reflects the value of the product while remaining within your budget constraints. I look forward to your consideration of this offer.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. While I appreciate your flexibility, I am still unable to meet at $95. Based on my budget and considering the current market, I am willing to pay up to $85 for the product. I hope this revised offer meets your needs.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your financial considerations and am willing to meet you halfway once more. I propose a final offer of $87.50 for the product. This price ensures a fair transaction for both parties and remains within your budget. I hope you find this offer acceptable.
